long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ЁЯУг  Overview:
This add-on was developed to effectively extract Comments data from PDF files. It offers the capability to extract comments from specific pages or all pages within a PDF.

ЁЯЪА  Key Features:
тЬЕ  Extraction of Comments, Authors, and Page Numbers.
тЬЕ  Option to select specific pages for extraction.
тЬЕ  Ability to export comments to CSV/XLSX formats.

Is it Free?
тЬФя╕П Absolutely! Basic functions are completely free to access, with an option to upgrade for additional features.

ЁЯУз  Feedback and Support:
For any questions or assistance, please contact us using the following link: 
https://forms.gle/eV7YhREsjPcNYxNA6

ЁЯФТ  Privacy and Security:
Our commitment to your privacy is paramount. All extracted data is processed locally and will never be transmitted to our servers. We do not store your data.
